definitions.title: 1. n.[m.]
definitions.body: fortune, good fortune (Ar. jad=un id., Aram. [[גַּדָּא]], gado0)—Ge 30:11 [[בּגד]] Kt, i.e. [[בְּגׇד]] ([[בָּא גׇדָ]] Qr), LXX e)n tu/xh|, by or with good fortune.

definitions.title: 2. n.pr.m.
definitions.body: god of fortune (Ar. jad= We:Skizzen iii. 171; [[גד]] named often in Ph. & Aram. inscript., & found in Ph. & Aram. n.pr., Bae:Rel 76 f. Nö:ZMG 1888, 479; v. esp. Siegf:JPTh 1875, 356 ff.)—c. [[לְ]] + art. [[לַגַּד]] Is 65:11 cf. Che.
